title.localized: Intimate and Splendid Luxury Cruise Ships

description.localized: We will take you where larger ships cannot reach, the intimate atmosphere is what makes our voyages special.

leadIn.localized: Our ships range in size from 51 to 364 suites to ensure each of our guests finds the perfect balance between choice and intimacy.

children.text: There is something uniquely satisfying about a smaller ship. The intimacy. The friendly camaraderie. The excitement of small, off-the-beaten-track
can sail up narrow waterways into the heart of a city or tie up right at the pier while others must anchor offshore. And for those who yearn to explore the new and unknown, Silverseaâ€™s

can transport you to the furthermost boundaries of the planet. Travel is the elixir of life at Silversea, and every cruise is a voyage of discovery. Come and explore the possibilities on a Silversea cruise.

description.localized: With 20-brand new Zodiacs, four superlative restaurants in Antarctica and a pole-to-pole expedition itinerary, Silver Cloud really does break the ice between expedition and luxury.
A new Dawn has arrived! Our tenth ultra-luxury ship joined our fleet in April 2022, sailing a worldwide itinerary that promises authentic, immersive experiences.

Weâ€™re proud to announce that our newest addition has joined the fleet. Silver Endeavour revolutionises our expedition voyages, and allows us to travel deeper to some of the planetâ€™s farthest flung coasts.
Built by cruise lovers, for cruise lovers, Silver Moon will be the epitome of 21st century luxury travel.
Silver Muse is without question an inspirational work of art. The best place between sea and sky, 8 dining venues, spacious outdoor areas and up-to-the-minute technology makes her simply divine.
Introducing Silver Nova â€“ the eleventh ship to join our fleet. Our newest vessel will join us in summer 2023, and will be a home away from home for up to 728 guests.
The most elegant ship ever to sail the Galapagos. The first destination specific ship built by Silversea, Silver Origin is the height of experiential travel in the Galapagos.

Portraying a dynamic and immediate connection with nature, where the touch of light inspires purity and movement, Silverseaâ€™s second Nova Class ship will be named Silver Ray. Set for a Summer 2024 debut.
Award-winning Silver Shadow has all the hallmarks of extreme luxury at sea. With one of the highest space-to-guest ratios at sea, Silver Shadow is a firm favourite in the Silversea fleet.

Amplify your experience! The all-new Silver Spirit has never looked better, nor felt cosier. Fully refurbished for a superlative onboard adventure, she retains our world famous standards of service and home away from home feel.

Our world-cruisers preferred ship, Silver Whisper sports a relaxing, sophisticated and genuinely elegant atmosphere. A multi-million dollar refit makes her one of the most technically up to the minute ships at sea.

Silver Wind is a perfect illustration of how complete a small-sized ship can be. With just 274-guests, beautiful suites and spacious public areas, Silver Wind is one of the cosiest and most intimate ships afloat today.

children.text: With a staff-to-guest ratio of nearly one to one, your every wish is fulfilled sometimes before you even ask

description.localized: With a staff-to-guest ratio of nearly 1:1, Silverseaâ€™s service is highly personalised, friendly â€¦ and all-inclusive.
Embark on a door-to-door luxury cruise that immerses you in the authentic beauty of the world.
Spacious suites with butler service and a choice of lavish amenities ensure personalised comfort and absolute indulgence.
From fine dining to informal venues to delicious in-suite service, Silverseaâ€™s gastronomic options have never been rivalled.
Our holistic approach to wellness integrates fitness and spa with lectures and nutritious dining to help guests maintain a healthy lifestyle.
